bath.description: For a while, Felix was an unhappy bather because he wanted to stand in the tub.  Now that Lucie's finally made him understand that baths are for sitting, he'll play happily in there for an hour.  He likes it so much that a few times he's cried when we've taken him out of the tub.
bath.title: Bath

book.description: Felix has started to select books off the shelf and flip through them.  Books with holey pages are the best.
book.title: Book

cheese.description: Now that he has a good set of teeth, and that he is getting better at chewing, Felix will attempt to eat anything.  Cheese is a new favorite.
cheese.title: Cheese

dec_babies1.description: At first, Felix surveys the herd from afar.
dec_babies1.title: Dec Babies 1

dec_babies2.description: Then he gets down into the action.
dec_babies2.title: Dec Babies 2

dec_babies3.description: Felix pays a visit to Meeta's mom's group.  Left to right: Charlie, Felix, Daniel, Shane, Barrett, Avery and Meg; all born in December 2001. Notice the extended fingers from one of the moms, on the upper left corner... that's some advanced hyptonizing trick she must be doing, to keep 7 hyperactive crawlers sitting still long enough for a photo.
dec_babies3.title: Dec Babies 3

dec_babies4.description: Yes, they are still all sitting down. Astounding.
dec_babies4.title: Dec Babies 4

drawer1.description: Proud to have figured out Dean's shorts drawer.
drawer1.title: Drawer 1

drawer2.description: Frustrated not to be able to open the drawer again.
drawer2.title: Drawer 2

ezekiel1.description: Ezekiel is the first baby in the gang to reach the big One Year. Felix is happy to test drive one of Ezekiel's birthday presents.  Ezekiel prefers the styrofoam packing.
ezekiel1.title: Ezekiel 1

ezekiel2.description: Ezekiel is truly a Wonder Baby.  He walks so well he never crawls anymore. He can say a few words, blow his nose, play the harmonica, go to sleep by himself, and eat with a fork. Go Ezekiel!
ezekiel2.title: Ezekiel 2

ezekiel3.description: By the time the cake is served, the birthday boy is exhausted.
ezekiel3.title: Ezekiel 3

ezekiel4.description: As soon as the birthday candle is out, so is Ezekiel. Jeremy barely has time to feed him one bite of his cake, before he falls asleep on Heather's shoulder. Sweet dreams.
ezekiel4.title: Ezekiel 4

jasper.description: Supper with Tim, Hazel and Jasper.  The secret to dining out with babies?  Find a restaurant where the background noise is louder than a crying baby.
jasper.title: Jasper

night_laugh.description: In the evening, Felix can get into a laughing hysteria. Something strikes him as funny (here, Lucie mock-falling down) and he laughs more and more, each time the trick is repeated. His laugh is contagious, and soon everyone is cracking up.
night_laugh.title: Night Laugh

snuggle.description: Felix loves snuggling up and giving big sloppy kisses.  He hasn't learned to pucker yet.
snuggle.title: Snuggle

theater.description: Carrie, a friend from Lucie's knitting club, is in a play, Hans my Hedgehog. Felix loved it. He was transfixed the full half hour. He even clapped at the end, albeit after everyone else had stopped clapping.
theater.title: Theater

totland1.description:
A sunny Saturday afternoon in Berkeley's best playground: Totland.

Felix loves push toys. He used to look like he was falling forward while using one of those, but now it is very controlled. He can stop when he wants.
totland1.title: Totland 1

totland2.description: Practising walking is nice and all, but crawling is still the best way to get around.
totland2.title: Totland 2

description:
Felix turned 11 months old this week.

He doesn't speak, and he's never been into mimicking (be it sticking out his tongue, waving bye-bye, or repeating a sound). So it's hard to know how much he understands. Lucie did a little experiment. She asked Felix:

"Il est où Papa?" (Where is daddy?) Dean wasn't home, but Felix looked eagerly around.

"Papa est dans la salle de bain, bébé. Va dans la salle de bain, va voir Papa." (Daddy is in the bathroom, baby. Go to the bathroom, go see Daddy.) Felix immidiately crawled to the bathroom. Once there, he looked very confused. Where was dad?
title: November 17
